text: Monna ea kholoang har’a sechaba sa Faro, ea neng a patile Tumelo ea hae, a re, o: “U bolaea motho hobane a re: “Mong`a ka ke Allah?’ – Ea u tliselitseng lits’upiso tse hlakileng tse tsoang ho Mong`a hau? Ha feela eba a le leshano, leshano la hae le tlaba holim’a hae; empa haeba a bua ‘nete, tse ling tsa lintho tseo ebang o u hlokomelisa ka tsona, li tla o aparela; ruri! Allah ha A tataise motho ea tlolang meeli le ea leshano
